title: ЛАПТОП LENOVO LOQ 15IRH8 I7-13620H/16GB DDR5/512GB/RTX 4050 6GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј: 15.6" (39.5cm)
Резолуција:(1920x1080) FHD, IPS, 350nits, Anti-glare, 45% NTSC, 144Hz, G-SYNC®
Chipset: Intel® SoC Platform
Процесор:Intel® Core™ i7-13620H, 10C (6P + 4E) / 16T, P-core 2.4 / 4.9GHz, E-core 1.8 / 3.6GHz, 24MB
Графичка:NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4050 6GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2370MHz, TGP 95W
RAM меморија:16GB DDR5-5200
Диск (Storage):512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0x4 NVMe®
Без оперативен систем
Аудио: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
Звучник:Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Gaming Audio
Камера:HD 720p with E-shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
Тастатура: White Backlit, English
Wireless:Wi-Fi® 6, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.1
Порти:
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Power connector
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1
1x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
2x USB 3.2 Gen 2
Батерија: Integrated 60Wh
Power Adapter: 170W Slim Tip (3-pin)
